data.title: Wireframe
data.description: A screen blueprint, is a visual guide which provide a clear overview of the page structure, layout, information architecture, user flow, functionality, and intended behaviors.

data.title: Graphics
data.description: It is a creatively balanced visual presentation of something with a purpose. It can be photos, images, illustrations, cartoons, callouts, infographics, and print media articles.
